The Thing

Rank: 802


A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.


Director: John Carpenter

Writer: Bill Lancaster, John W. Campbell Jr.

Stars: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David

Tags: Alien Invasion, Body Horror, Monster Horror, Psychological Horror, Supernatural Horror, Suspense Mystery, Tragedy, Horror, Mystery, Sci,Fi
